snippet: The agreement on a new timetable for handing over a Marine airfield and other military bases could help solve an issue that has strained America’s ties with its largest Asian ally.
abstract: United States and Japan agree on new timetable for return to Japan of Marine airfield and other military bases on Okinawa, moving to solve long-festering issue that has bedeviled America’s ties with its largest Asian ally.
lead_paragraph: The agreement on a new timetable for handing over a Marine airfield and other military bases could help solve an issue that has strained America’s ties with its largest Asian ally.

headline.main: U.S. and Japan Agree on Returning Okinawa Land
headline.print_headline: U.S. and Japan Agree on Returning Okinawa Land

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
